description:
Job Title: Chief Marketing Officer (CMO)

Location: Major Metro Market (Flexible) with up to 40% Travel

About the Company:

Our client is a dynamic and innovative company known for its commitment to excellence and market leadership. They are seeking a highly experienced Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) to lead their marketing efforts and drive the company’s brand strategy, customer engagement, and growth initiatives. The ideal candidate will be located in a major metro market and be willing to travel up to 40% of the time to support various business needs.

Position Overview:

As the Chief Marketing Officer, you will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive marketing strategies that align with the company’s overall business objectives. You will lead a diverse marketing team, oversee all aspects of marketing including digital, brand, and product marketing, and work closely with the executive team to drive growth. This role requires a strategic thinker with a proven track record in marketing leadership, exceptional communication skills, and the ability to operate in a fast-paced, competitive environment.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and implement a comprehensive marketing strategy that supports the company’s business goals and drives brand awareness, customer acquisition, and revenue growth.
  • Lead, mentor, and manage a high-performing marketing team across various functions including digital marketing, brand management, product marketing, and communications.
  • Oversee the creation and execution of marketing campaigns, ensuring they are effective, innovative, and aligned with the company’s brand and messaging.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including sales, product development, and customer service, to ensure a cohesive approach to market positioning and customer engagement.
  • Utilize data-driven insights to make informed decisions, optimize marketing efforts, and measure the success of campaigns and strategies.
  • Manage the marketing budget, ensuring efficient allocation of resources and a strong return on investment.
  • Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and client meetings, requiring travel up to 40% of the time.
  • Stay ahead of industry trends and competitive landscape to keep the company at the forefront of the market.
  • Work closely with the executive team to communicate marketing strategies and results, providing regular updates and insights to stakeholders.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, or a related field; MBA or relevant advanced degree preferred.
  • 10+ years of experience in marketing, with at least 5 years in a senior leadership role.
  • Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing strategies in a fast-paced environment.
  • Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire and manage a diverse team.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships across all levels of the organization.
  • Experience in digital marketing, brand management, and data-driven marketing strategies.
  • Ability to travel up to 40% of the time to support business needs.
  • Must be located in a major metro market.

Compensation and Benefits:

  • Competitive base salary with performance-based bonus opportunities.
  • Comprehensive benefits package, including health, dental, and vision insurance.
  • Retirement plan options.
  • Opportunities for professional development and career growth.
  • Flexible work arrangements with travel requirements.
